statements: SELECT * FROM FarmToTableDishes
SELECT dish_name, price FROM FarmToTableDishes WHERE price > 15.00
SELECT farm_location, ingredients FROM FarmToTableDishes WHERE farm_location LIKE 'California%'
SELECT dish_name, price FROM FarmToTableDishes ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM FarmToTableDishes WHERE ingredients IS NOT NULL
SELECT dish_id, dish_name, price FROM FarmToTableDishes WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM FarmToTableDishes WHERE farm_location = 'California' AND ingredients LIKE '%organic%' ORDER BY dish_name;
SELECT dish_name, farm_location FROM FarmToTableDishes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%gluten-free%' AND price < 30;
SELECT COUNT(dish_id) AS total_dishes, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM FarmToTableDishes;
SELECT * FROM FarmToTableDishes ORDER BY dish_name ASC, price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM menu;
SELECT dish_name, price FROM menu ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT dish_name, ingredients[1] FROM menu WHERE dish_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT dish_name, quantity, total_price FROM sales_data JOIN menu ON sales_data.dish_id = menu.dish_id ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM menu WHERE dish_id = 1;
SELECT dish_name, price FROM menu ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT dish_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_sold FROM menu JOIN sales_data ON menu.dish_id = sales_data.dish_id GROUP BY dish_name;
SELECT dish_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM menu WHERE price > 15 GROUP BY dish_name HAVING AVG(price) > 20;
SELECT dish_name, sale_date, quantity, total_price FROM menu JOIN sales_data ON menu.dish_id = sales_data.dish_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT sale_id, dish_name, price, quantity, sales_date FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM popular_dishes ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT dish_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE price > 50;
SELECT dish_name, dish_category FROM popular_dishes WHERE popularity_score >= 80;
SELECT sale_id, dish_name, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT dish_name, price, quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY price ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM popular_dishes WHERE popularity_score > 50 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT dish_name, popularity_score, dish_category FROM popular_dishes WHERE dish_category = 'Vegetarian' ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT sd.dish_name, mo.discount_amount, mo.recommended_quantity FROM sales_data sd JOIN menu_optimization mo ON sd.sale_id = mo.optimization_id ORDER BY sd.dish_name ASC;

SELECT sd.dish_name, pd.popularity_score, mo.discount_amount FROM sales_data sd JOIN popular_dishes pd ON sd.dish_name = pd.dish_name JOIN menu_optimization mo ON pd.dish_id = mo.dish_id WHERE pd.popularity_score > 70 ORDER BY pd.popularity_score DESC, mo.discount_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM dishes;
SELECT dish_name, ingredients FROM dishes WHERE price > 10;
SELECT dish_name, price FROM dishes ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT menu_name, start_date, end_date FROM menus ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM dishes WHERE price > 10.00 ORDER BY dish_name DESC;
SELECT dish_name, ingredients FROM dishes WHERE dish_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY dish_id ASC;
SELECT dish_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM dishes JOIN sales ON dishes.dish_id = sales.dish_id GROUP BY dish_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT dish_id, AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM sales GROUP BY dish_id HAVING AVG(revenue) > 50.00 ORDER BY average_revenue ASC;
SELECT dishes.dish_name, menus.menu_name, menus.start_date FROM dishes JOIN menus ON dishes.dish_id = menus.menu_id WHERE menus.start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY menus.start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT dish_name, ingredient_list FROM FarmToTableDishes ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT item_name, price FROM MenuItems WHERE price < 20.00;
SELECT dish_name, ingredient_list, popularity_score FROM FarmToTableDishes WHERE popularity_score >= 4.5;
SELECT dish_name, ingredient_list, popularity_score FROM FarmToTableDishes WHERE popularity_score > 4 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC
SELECT item_name, price FROM MenuItems WHERE price < 10.00 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, loyalty_points FROM Customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC
SELECT dish_name, ingredient_list, popularity_score FROM FarmToTableDishes WHERE popularity_score BETWEEN 3 AND 4 ORDER BY dish_name ASC
SELECT item_name, price, dish_name FROM MenuItems INNER JOIN FarmToTableDishes ON MenuItems.dish_id = FarmToTableDishes.dish_id ORDER BY dish_name ASC, price DESC
